title: Angular 17 + Spring Boot Chat
info: Real-time multi-user chat platform built with Spring Boot and Angular 17. This platform allows registered users to add contacts and communicate in real time with each other through the use of websockets, also ensuring security through a token-based JWT authentication system.

title: Bootstrap Website Layout
info: Web interface for a randomly themed ecommerce. Fully responsive design built following a mobile-first design pattern using the Bootstrap web layout framework. This is a project that lacks interactivity, with the sole purpose of demonstrating my skills in the design and layout process with Bootstrap.

title: MEAN Stack PrimeNG UI Store Admin
info: This application is a stock manager for warehouses, developed using the frontend trio of HTML, CSS, and JS, and leveraging Node.js and MongoDB on the server side. It allows the creation of new products through a form, as well as the execution of advanced searches using a criteria-based filtering system. Lastly, it presents the obtained results in tables and enables operations for editing and deleting products.

title: Node JS + Mongo DB + Vanilla JS Stock Manager
info: This application is a stock manager for warehouses, developed using the frontend trio of HTML, CSS, and JS, and leveraging Node.js and MongoDB on the server side. It allows the creation of new products through a form, as well as the execution of advanced searches using a criteria-based filtering system. Lastly, it presents the obtained results in tables and enables operations for editing and deleting products.

title: PHP Multi User Tasks Manager
info: Monolithic, multi-user task manager built entirely in PHP. It features a session-based authentication system and uses a JSON file to emulate a database. Additionally, it employs object-oriented PHP, enhancing the structure and maintainability of the code.
